name: Achievements
install_msg:
Thanks for installing. **NOTE** This cog is currently in beta version and is not fully finished.
if you enjoy my cog and wants to support me, you can do so from [github sponsor](<https://github.com/sponsors/ltzmax>) or [buy me a coffee](<https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ltzmax>)
description: Earn achievements by chatting in channels.
short: Earn achievements by chatting in channels.
end_user_data_statement: This cog records messages sent and Discord IDs for the purpose of earning achievements.
